summary: At a Catholic high school, a sophomore newspaper reporter investigates a case of stolen SAT exams. He thinks he's nailed the suspect and managed to get the popular girl when he realises a larger conspiracy is afoot.
cast: Mischa Barton|Reece Thompson|Bruce Willis|Michael Rapaport|Kathryn Morris|Melonie Diaz|Josh Pais|Luke Grimes|Patrick Taylor|Aaron Himelstein|Joe Perrino|John Magaro|Robin Lord Taylor|Vincent Piazza|Zoë Kravitz|Zachary Booth|Adam Pally|Tanya Fischer|Josh Caras|Zach Roerig|Ashley Springer|Emily Meade|Gabrielle Brennan|Jake Weary|Jessica Link|Laura Ford|Linsey Miller|Marc John Jefferies|Maria Elena Ramirez|Michael Zegen|Nick Blaemire|Quinn Shephard|Whitney Sprayberry|Zoe Weizenbaum|Tomas Deckaj|Effrem J. Adams|Cara AnnMarie|Angelina Aucello|Christine Bermudez|Andrew Bradley|Emily Brownell|Alana Cadiz|Gary Cherkassky|Casey Cipriani|Ryan Curtis|Elsbeth Denman|Momo Dione|John Farrer|Cassidy Gard|Katie Groves|Cassie Hansen|Janelle Henry|Jeanine Hill|Robert Malitsky|Ramy Mam|Ronnie McCoullough|Joel Ney|Chris Nuñez|Enrique Sebastian Rivas|Louis Rosario|Steven Rubinchik|Ben Skinner|Kathryn Wahl
title: La conspiración
